'''1.7.10-pre1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.7.10]], released on June 3, 2014, containing Realms changes.<ref name=mamirm>{{tweet|mamirm|473827599932997632|Minecraft 1.7.10-pre release with Realms improvements/changes:|June 3, 2014}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Minecraft Realms]]'''
* All Realms-related modules were moved into a separate library.
** Future additional features to Realms will not require new releases of ''Minecraft''.
* New features
** Player activity monitor.
** Access to more server settings.
*** PVP: On/Off.
*** Difficulty: Peaceful/Easy/Normal/Hard.
*** Spawn protection: Off/1..16.
*** Gamemode: Creative/Adventure/Survival.
*** Spawn animals: On/Off.
*** Spawn monsters: On/Off.
*** Spawn NPCs: On/Off.
* Improvements in Realms UI.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.7.10-pre1|prefix=
|55580|Minecraft Realms: User will still have Operator rights after re-inviting them.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* This pre-release released on the same day as [[Java Edition 1.14.3 Pre-Release 1|1.14.3 Pre-Release 1]], but five years earlier.
